snippet: At least 66 of the 300 partners at Dewey & LeBoeuf have left the firm since the beginning of the year. Dewey missed its financial targets last year and cut its partners' salaries, many of which were guaranteed.
abstract: At least 66 of the 300 partners at Dewey & LeBoeuf have left the firm since the beginning of the year. Dewey missed its financial targets last year and cut its partners' salaries, many of which were guaranteed.

headline.main: Dewey Loses Eight More Partners as Departures Accelerate
